import React, { Component } from "react"; import tokenLogo from '../token-logo.png' import ethLogo from '../eth-logo.png' class Main extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { output: '0', input: '0' } } render() { return (
{ event.preventDefault() let etherAmount = this.input }}>
Balance: {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.ethBalance, 'Ether')}
{ const etherAmount = this.input.value.toString(); this.setState({ output: etherAmount * 100 }) }} ref={(input)=>{ this.input = input }} required />

); } } export default Main;
